"A.D.2028/3/29/10:00": "Even today, there are odd jobs around the Student Council... Also, I have to really look at the school's entrance ceremony preparations, otherwise I won't know what's going on."
"Because of that, I couldn't enter \"PSO2\" yesterday. Now, let's hurry and finish this work."

"Really, Hitsugi.
You still play that thing?"
"Urgh, that voice..."
"I knew it- Big brother... Enga."
"What an unpleasant surprise we have here. I'm really happy to see you though, little sis."
"W-what on earth are you doing here! This is the Girls' Dorm! No guys allowed!"
"Ah, but you forget, family members are excluded from that little rule."
"Urgh. T-then what do you want?"
"Nothing from you. It's your room that I need to check on."
"E-eh? My room..! N-nothing's changed at all in there. What's this all of a sudden!?"
"As the head of the Yasaka family, I need to make sure you're keeping your room clean and tidy. I worry that my little sister isn't growing up right."
"...That said, it's obvious you haven't grown up much at all."
"Q-Quiet you! It's none of your business! Ah- come on! Stop petting my head like I'm a kid!"
"Well then, back to the subject at hand. Hitsugi, are you really sure there's nothing different about your room?"
"...W-why do you want to know?"
"I'm the one asking you. There's nothing in there, right?"
"...Of course not."
"...That's good, then."
"Wait a minute, big bro! Answer my question! Why did you have to ask me about that!?"
"...That reminds me, Hitsugi. I've heard that you're the favourite to become the next Student Council President."
"It's good that you're excelling. And having that power would be nice, wouldn't it?"
"That said, don't let yourself get pulled into things."
"If you start sticking your nose in before you're ready, sooner or later something will happen to you that can't be undone."
"What do you mean by that...?"
"I just answered your question. All that's left is for you to figure it out yourself, future Student Council President."
"Ah-wait up! Geez! He always give you things to think about."
"Excelling, becoming Student Council President, wielding power, and... helping \"Mother\". What's bad about that, idiot brother."
"Sorry Kohri. I'm a bit late cause my brother showed up."
"Oh, you just came at the right time."
"You... you're that pervert president! Yeah, Hagith Anie!"
"What a terrible way to remember a person!"
"H-Hitsugi..! I'm glad! I'm soo relieved!"
"I'm relieved, Hitsugi! Soo glad you came..! I believed in you!"
"K-Kohri, aren't you exaggerating a bit...? Wai- It can't be!-"
"I didn't do anything. Nothing at all. I'm a graduate of this place. I was also the Student Council President here 5 years ago."
"A former Student Council President... Then you must be a member of Mother Cluster too..."
"All Student Council members belong to Mother Cluster, right? Of course, I'm no exception."
"I was walking past and thought of stopping by to visit. It's been a while since I felt like an upperclassman here, but I suppose I went a bit too far."
"I wanted to ask some high school students about their thoughts on our apps, but that can wait until next time. Well... I'll see you around, Hitsugi Yasaka."
"Kohri, it's okay now, that pervert left already... Kohri? Are you really okay?"
"...Say, Hitsugi. Do you remember when \"Mother\"... invited you into Mother Cluster?"
"I still remember it to this day. It's something I'll never forget."
"Back then, I didn't have any friends. I was all alone... That's when \"Mother\" started guiding me. Leading me to Mother Cluster."

"And then, I was able to meet you, Hitsugi.
\"Mother\" made sure that I met you."
"To my lonely self, you're my very first friend. My first important person."
"Because I followed \"Mother's\" words... It's thanks to \"Mother\" that I'm able to meet and get along with you, Hitsugi... And then-also..!"
"Kohri..."
"...Hitsugi, you won't go anywhere right? Your place is here, Hitsugi."
"Everything will be okay if you listen to \"Mother\". Everyone will be happy. So... don't go anywhere, okay?"
"...Listen to \"Mother\", huh."
"The sense of trust in \"Mother\" is amazing."
"...What is \"Mother\" exactly? Is it really such an overwhelming presence?"
"At any rate, that was Hitsugi's older brother. The difference in height is almost like a parent and their child."
